plot outline: Ore Manasu is a Comedy Tale, movie based on father and son, who gives importance to money and relationship respectively, and the comedy revolution between them. Gajan loves his maternal uncle's daughter, but his father makes troublesome plans to stop. Hero brought beggars from street and told that they are millionare's from Singapore. Whether his father's mind changes or not, rest of the story.
title: Ore Manasu
plot: _Ore Manasu_ (qv) is a Comedy Tale, movie based on father and son, who gives importance to money and relationship respectively, and the comedy revolution between them. Gajan loves his maternal uncle's daughter, but his father makes troublesome plans to stop. Hero brought beggars from street and told that they are millionare's from Singapore. Whether his father's mind changes or not, rest of the story.
